source:
spark.sql(f"""
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE fo_sanctioneddb.FACTActualVw
USING DELTA 
TBLPROPERTIES ('delta.columnMapping.mode' = 'name')
LOCATION 'abfss://{fabric_workspace}@onelake.dfs.fabric.microsoft.com/fo_sanctioneddb.Lakehouse/Tables/FACTActual'
AS
WITH ComputedValues AS (
    SELECT 
        fa.PKFACTACTUAL,
        fa.LedgerTransDate,
        fa.MainAcct,
        fa.AccountingCurrency,
        fa.ActualAmount,
        fa.ActualInvoiceAmount,
        fa.ActualQuantity,
        fa.ActualHours,
        fa.ActualHours_NonUtilized_Client,
        fa.ActualHours_NonUtilized_Internal,
        fa.ActualHours_NonUtilized_PTO,
        fa.ActualHours_Utilized_Bill,
        fa.ActualHours_Utilized_Internal,
        fa.ActualHours_Utilized_NonBill,
        fa.CategoryID,
        fa.CostSales,
        fa.CHEmplRev,
        fa.CHReviewedDateTime,
        fa.CHUDFCode,
        fa.CHIsRevenueAdjustment,
        fa.CHHourJournalLine,
        fa.CHDescription,
        fa.EmplItemID,
        fa.InventTransID,
        fa.ItemSalesTaxGroup,
        fa.LedgerOrigin,
        fa.PaymentDate,
        fa.PaymentStatus,
        fa.ProjAdjustRefID,
        fa.ProjTransPostingRecID,
        fa.ProjTransPostingTransID,
        fa.ReportingCurrencyCode,
        fa.ReportingExchangeRateType,
        fa.SalesTaxGroup,
        fa.VendorAccountNum,
        fa.VendorInvoiceDataAreaID,
        fa.VendorInvoiceNum,
        fa.FKVendor,
        fa.Voucher,
        fa.FKActivity,
        fa.FKCLIN,
        fa.FKCurrencyID,
        fa.FKCustomer,
        fa.FKDataArea,
        fa.FKDateFinancial,
        fa.FKDefaultDimension,
        fa.FKExchangeRate,
        fa.FKGCPayType,
        fa.FKLedgerDimension,
        fa.FKLineProperty,
        fa.FKPostingType,
        fa.FKProject,
        fa.FKProjectCategory,
        fa.FKProjectController,
        fa.FKProjectFundingSource,
        fa.FKProjectManager,
        fa.FKProjectRole,
        fa.FKProjectTransactionType,
        fa.FKProjTransDate,
        fa.FKProjTransDateActual,
        fa.FKResource,
        fa.FKSalesManager,
        fa.FKTimeSheet,
        fa.FKUDF,
        fa.FKWorkLocation,
        fa.FKFinancialDimension,
        fa.FKExpense,
        fa.DESCRIPTION,
        fa.TRANSACTIONORIGIN,
        fa.CHSalesLedgerDate,
        fa.CHCostLedgerDate,
        fa.EFFECTIVEDATE,
        fa.EXPIRATIONDATE,
        fa.PURCHNUMBERSEQUENCE,
        fa.CHSUBCONTRACTCEILINGAMOUNT,
        fa.ProjInvoiceStatus,
        fa.CHFundingStreamAllocationType,
        fa.CHIsAllocated,
        fa.CHAllocationRefTransID,
        fa.TransIDRef,
        fa.CHSubcontractType,
        -- Compute the new CostAcct column
        CASE 
            WHEN fa.CostSales = 'Sales' THEN COALESCE(fa.CostAcct, fa.MainAcct)
            WHEN fa.CostSales = 'Cost' THEN fa.MainAcct
        END AS CostAcct,
        -- Cast numeric columns
        CAST(fa.ActualAmount AS DECIMAL(38,16)) AS ActualAmount_,
        CAST(fa.ActualInvoiceAmount AS DECIMAL(38,16)) AS ActualInvoiceAmount_,
        CAST(fa.ActualQuantity AS DECIMAL(38,16)) AS ActualQuantity_,
        fa.ActualHours AS ActualHours_,
        fa.CHSalesLedgerDate AS Sales_Ledger_Date,
        fa.CHCostLedgerDate AS Cost_Ledger_Date
    FROM
        fo_sanctioneddb.deFactActual fa
)
SELECT
    fa.PKFACTACTUAL,
    fa.LedgerTransDate AS AccountingDate,
    fa.MainAcct AS Acct,
    fa.CostAcct,
    fa.AccountingCurrency,
    fa.ActualAmount_,
    CAST(
        CASE 
            WHEN fa.CostAcct >= '40000' THEN fa.ActualAmount
            WHEN fa.CostAcct IN ('31001','32001','33001','34001') THEN fa.ActualAmount
            ELSE 0
        END AS DECIMAL(38,16)
    ) AS FilteredAmount,
    fa.ActualHours_,
    (fa.ActualHours_NonUtilized_Client + fa.ActualHours_NonUtilized_Internal + fa.ActualHours_NonUtilized_PTO
    + fa.ActualHours_Utilized_Bill + fa.ActualHours_Utilized_NonBill) AS ActualHours_Total_,
    fa.ActualHours_Utilized_Bill AS ActualHours_Utilized_Bill_,
    fa.ActualHours_Utilized_Internal AS ActualHours_Utilized_Internal_,
    fa.ActualHours_Utilized_NonBill AS ActualHours_Utilized_NonBill_,
    (fa.ActualHours_Utilized_Bill + fa.ActualHours_Utilized_NonBill) AS ActualHours_Utilized_Total_,
    fa.ActualInvoiceAmount_,
    fa.ActualQuantity_,
    fa.CategoryID,
    fa.CostSales,
    fa.CHEmplRev,
    fa.CHReviewedDateTime,
    fa.CHUDFCode,
    fa.CHIsRevenueAdjustment,
    fa.CHHourJournalLine,
    fa.CHDescription,
    fa.EmplItemID,
    fa.InventTransID,
    fa.ItemSalesTaxGroup,
    fa.LedgerOrigin,
    fa.PaymentDate,
    fa.PaymentStatus,
    fa.ProjAdjustRefID,
    fa.ProjTransPostingRecID,
    fa.ProjTransPostingTransID AS TransactionID,
    fa.ReportingCurrencyCode,
    fa.ReportingExchangeRateType,
    fa.SalesTaxGroup,
    fa.VendorAccountNum,
    fa.VendorInvoiceDataAreaID,
    fa.VendorInvoiceNum,
    fa.FKVendor,
    fa.Voucher,
    fa.FKActivity,
    CASE 
        WHEN fa.FKProjectTransactionType = 1 THEN COALESCE(CLIN.PKClin, fa.FKActivity)
        ELSE ''
    END AS FKClin,
    fa.FKCurrencyID AS FKSalesCurrency,
    fa.FKCustomer,
    fa.FKDataArea,
    dd.LEGALENTITY,
    fa.FKDateFinancial,
    fa.FKDefaultDimension,
    fa.FKExchangeRate,
    fa.FKGCPayType,
    fa.FKLedgerDimension,
    fa.FKLineProperty,
    fa.FKPostingType,
    fa.FKProject,
    fa.FKProjectCategory,
    fa.FKProjectController,
    fa.FKProjectFundingSource,
    fa.FKProjectManager,
    fa.FKProjectRole,
    fa.FKProjectTransactionType,
    fa.FKProjTransDate,
    fa.FKProjTransDateActual,
    fa.FKResource,
    fa.FKSalesManager,
    fa.FKTimeSheet,
    fa.FKUDF,
    fa.FKWorkLocation,
    fa.FKFinancialDimension,
    fa.FKExpense,
    PL.CHRECID AS FKVendorPO,
    fa.CostSales AS FKProjCostSales,
    COALESCE(fa.DESCRIPTION, '') AS Description,
    Resource_Distinct.ResourceID,
    dd.TaxRequirement,
    fa.TRANSACTIONORIGIN,
    fa.Sales_Ledger_Date as `Sales Ledger Date`,
    fa.Cost_Ledger_Date as `Cost Ledger Date`,
    fa.EFFECTIVEDATE,
    fa.EXPIRATIONDATE,
    fa.PURCHNUMBERSEQUENCE,
    fa.CHSUBCONTRACTCEILINGAMOUNT,
    fa.ProjInvoiceStatus,
    fa.CHFundingStreamAllocationType,
    fa.CHIsAllocated,
    fa.CHAllocationRefTransID,
    fa.TransIDRef,
    fa.CHSubcontractType,
    dd.VENDOR AS Vendor,
    dd.VENDORNAME AS VendorName
FROM
    ComputedValues fa
LEFT JOIN
    fo_sanctioneddb.CH_CLIn CLIN 
    ON UPPER(fa.FKCLIN) = UPPER(CLIN.PKCLIN)
LEFT JOIN
    fo_sanctioneddb.CH_PURCHLINESTAGING PL 
    ON UPPER(fa.PROJTRANSPOSTINGTRANSID) = UPPER(PL.PROJTRANSID) 
    AND UPPER(fa.InventTransID) = UPPER(PL.InventTransID)
LEFT JOIN
    fo_sanctioneddb.Resource_Distinct Resource_Distinct 
    ON UPPER(fa.FKResource) = UPPER(Resource_Distinct.PKResource)
LEFT JOIN
    fo_sanctioneddb.PMBI_DEFAULTDIMENSION dd 
    ON UPPER(fa.FKDefaultDimension) = UPPER(dd.PKDefaultDimension);

spark.sql(f"""
CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE fo_sanctioneddb.FACTActual
USING DELTA
TBLPROPERTIES ('delta.columnMapping.mode' = 'name')
LOCATION 'abfss://{fabric_workspace}@onelake.dfs.fabric.microsoft.com/fo_sanctioneddb.Lakehouse/Tables/FACTActual'
AS
SELECT
    fa.PKFACTACTUAL,
    CAST(fa.AccountingDate AS TIMESTAMP) AS AccountingDate,
    fa.Acct,
    fa.CostAcct,
    fa.AccountingCurrency,
    CAST(fa.ActualAmount_ AS FLOAT) AS ActualAmount_,
    fa.ActualHours_,
 
    CAST(fa.FilteredAmount AS FLOAT) AS FilteredAmount,
    fa.ActualHours_Total_,
    CAST(fa.ActualInvoiceAmount_ AS FLOAT) AS ActualInvoiceAmount_,
    CAST(fa.ActualQuantity_ AS FLOAT) AS ActualQuantity_,
 
    fa.CategoryID,
    fa.CostSales,
    fa.CHEmplRev,
    CAST(fa.CHReviewedDateTime AS TIMESTAMP) AS CHReviewedDateTime,
    fa.CHUDFCode,
    fa.CHIsRevenueAdjustment,
    fa.CHHourJournalLine,
    fa.CHDescription,
    fa.EmplItemID,
    fa.InventTransID,
    fa.ItemSalesTaxGroup,
    fa.LedgerOrigin,
 
    CAST(fa.PaymentDate AS TIMESTAMP) AS PaymentDate,
    fa.PaymentStatus,
    fa.ProjAdjustRefID,
    fa.ProjTransPostingRecID,
    fa.TransactionID,
    fa.ReportingCurrencyCode,
    fa.ReportingExchangeRateType,
    fa.SalesTaxGroup,
    fa.VendorAccountNum,
    fa.VendorInvoiceDataAreaID,
    --NULL AS VendorInvoiceDate,
    CAST(NULL AS INT) AS VendorInvoiceDate,
    fa.VendorInvoiceNum,
    fa.FKVendor,
    fa.Voucher,
    fa.FKActivity,
    fa.FKClin,
    fa.FKSalesCurrency,
    fa.FKCustomer,
    fa.FKDataArea,
    fa.LEGALENTITY,
    fa.FKDateFinancial,
    fa.FKDefaultDimension,
    fa.FKExchangeRate,
    fa.FKGCPayType,
    fa.FKLedgerDimension,
    fa.FKLineProperty,
    fa.FKPostingType,
    fa.FKProject,
    fa.FKProjectCategory,
    fa.FKProjectController,
    fa.FKProjectFundingSource,
    fa.FKProjectManager,
    fa.FKProjectRole,
    fa.FKProjectTransactionType,
    fa.FKProjTransDate,
    fa.FKProjTransDateActual,
    fa.FKResource,
    fa.FKSalesManager,
    fa.FKTimeSheet,
    fa.FKUDF,
    fa.FKWorkLocation,
    fa.FKFinancialDimension,
    fa.FKExpense,
    fa.FKVendorPO,
    fa.FKProjCostSales,
    fa.Description,
    --NULL AS ModifiedDate,
    --NULL AS CreatedDate,
    CAST(NULL AS INT) AS ModifiedDate,
    CAST(NULL AS INT) AS CreatedDate,
    fa.ResourceID,
    fa.TaxRequirement,
    fa.TRANSACTIONORIGIN,
    CAST(fa.`Sales Ledger Date` AS TIMESTAMP) AS `Sales Ledger Date`,
    CAST(fa.`Cost Ledger Date` AS TIMESTAMP) AS `Cost Ledger Date`,
    CAST(fa.EffectiveDate AS TIMESTAMP) AS EffectiveDate,
    CAST(fa.ExpirationDate AS TIMESTAMP) AS ExpirationDate,
    fa.PurchNumberSequence,
    CAST(fa.CHSubcontractCeilingAmount AS FLOAT) AS CHSubcontractCeilingAmount,
    fa.ProjInvoiceStatus,
    fa.CHFundingStreamAllocationType,
    fa.CHIsAllocated,
    fa.CHAllocationRefTransID,
    fa.TransIDRef,
    fa.CHSubcontractType,
    fa.Vendor AS VendorID,
    fa.VendorName
FROM
    fo_sanctioneddb.FACTActualVw fa
